segments.text: Speaking . May I ask whom I am talking to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Li with Silk Company . We met last Sunday during the exhibition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I remember your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for visiting our products . I remember that you are interested in our silk products and so , could I have a meeting with you this week to show you moreinformation about our products ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to , but I'm afraid that my schedule is full this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about next week ? Is it convenient for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am . How about 10 a . m . on next Friday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any time you say is OK .
segments.speaker: S1
